rukus.text: cea midi phicarna dxk hrux wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng xanwy khwam sadwk hı kæ phwk cea sing thi mi xyu nı phændin læa reux læn pi tam thxng thale doy baycha khxng phraxngkh læa thrng yud chan fa mi hı man tklng ma bn phændin wentæ doy xnumati khxng phraxngkh thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xxnyon phu thrng metta semx tx mnusʹy
Læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng hı phwk cea pen læw thrng hı phwk cea tay hlangcak nan k thrng hı phwk cea pen xik thæcring mnusʹy nan chang nerkhun ying

sahrab thuk «prachachati rea di kahnd phithi thang sasna khun doythi phwk khea ptibati phithi nan dangnan khn hnung khn dı xya di toyæng cea nı kickar nan læa cng reiyk rxng cheiy chwn pi su phracea khxng cea thæcring cea nan xyu bn næwthang thi theiyngthrrm
læa hak phwk khea toyæng cea k cng klaw theid wa xallxhˌ thrng rxbru ying nı sing thi phwk than kratha xyu
xallxhˌ ca thrng tadsin rahwang phwk than nı wan ki ya mah nı sing thi phwk than di khadyæng kan nı reuxng nan
cea mi ru dxk hrux wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng rxbru sing thi xyu nı chan fa læa phændin thæcring sing nan xyu nı banthuk læw thæcring nı kar nan penkar ngay day sahrab xallxhˌ

læa phwk khea sakkara bucha sing xun ca kxallxhˌ sung phraxngkh midi prathan lng ma hı pen hlakthan læa sahrab phwk khea mimi khwam ru keiyw kab reuxng ni læa sahrab phwk xthrrm nan mimi phu chwyhelux dı «

læa meux xongkar thanghlay xan chad cæng khxng rea di thuk na ma xan kæ phwk khea cea ca sangket hen xakar bxkpad mi yxmrab bn bıhna khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa phwk khea keuxb ca kheapi tharay brrda phu xan xongkar thanghlay khxng rea hı phwk khea fang cng klaw theid(muhammad) chan cacæng hı phwk than thrab thung sing thi lew ray ying kwa ni him man khux fi nrk ngi lea xallxhˌ thrng sayya man wi kæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa læa man pen thang klab thi chaw ray ying
